question: (Mike and Mike in the ESPN studio deliver the clue)"When it comes to controversy, not much can top the Black Sox scandal of 1919""Not much true -- but for me, nothing is as bad as in 1989 when this record-breaking player was banned from baseball for gambling on games while still a manager"
